Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: This bug looks pretty bad, and is a way for NN private keys to be stolen on VPS's. No mitigations, it's a hardware bug

Author: dukeleto#7326
Content: I would be pretty concerned if I was running a notary on a VPS that is shared with other users on the same hardware. They say they can leak OpenSSH private keys or anything else

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content:
```time komodo-cli -ac_name=WLC listunspent | grep 0.00010000 | wc -l
1509
real    0m0.247s```
```cat test.sh
#!/bin/bash
for i in `seq 0 2000`;  do
        time komodo-cli -ac_name=WLC listunspent 1 7777 > /dev/null
done
```
ALL of the results for those 2000 listunspents are i this range: 
```real    0m0.006s
user    0m0.004s
sys     0m0.000s

real    0m0.007s
user    0m0.004s
sys     0m0.000s

real    0m0.007s
user    0m0.000s
sys     0m0.004s

real    0m0.008s
user    0m0.000s
sys     0m0.008s
```

Content: works mint.
